questions_and_notes: check that only 2 of following 3 water contents are requested: frozen, liquid, frozen+liquid.  root modified to be consistent with mrsol-Emon and mrfso-Lmon.   Also see https://github.com/WCRP-CORDEX/cordex-cmip6-data-request/issues/2 .
cell_methods: area: mean where land time: mean
long_name: Frozen Water Content of Soil Layer
comment: in each soil layer, the mass of water in ice phase.  Reported as "missing" for grid cells occupied entirely by "sea"
